Description: Book of the Dead of Paser(eighteen fragments); full colour vignettes; Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: This papyrus was formerly 15 sheets: frames 16-19 were formerly EA 9971 and frames 20-21 were formerly 9972, according to the Archival Papyrus Records Book. This frame is still labelled as 9971.2 To be published by Guenther Lapp (Basel).
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (195)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (133518) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/133518)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: displaced fragments, fractured, brittle, loss Black ink Pigment Supported locally: glassine paper Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Sir T J Malcolm
